about_the_game:
Galactic Striker: An Exciting Adventure in the Depths of Space

Galactic Striker takes you on a high-paced top-down action adventure into the depths of space. As a space warrior, you will battle against enemy fleets, avoid obstacles, and complete missions to save the galaxy. With retro-style graphics and thrilling gameplay, Galactic Striker is perfect for both classic and modern gamers.

Features
Intense Space Battles: Fast-paced combat that tests your reflexes.
Variety of Enemy Types: Enemy ships with unique abilities.
Upgradeable Weapons and Power-ups: Enhance your ship with powerful weapons and special abilities.
Epic Boss Fights: Challenging boss battles at the end of each level.
Stunning Graphics and Sound Effects: Gorgeous retro graphics and atmospheric sound design.
Leaderboards and Achievements: Compare your scores with friends and collect all achievements.
Story
In the depths of the universe, you are a space warrior tasked with maintaining peace. A mysterious enemy force has begun threatening the galaxy, and only you can stop this menace. Use your skills and strategy to defeat enemy fleets, gather valuable resources, and save the galaxy.

Why Galactic Striker?
Galactic Striker combines retro and modern game mechanics to provide you with a unique experience. With fast-paced action, strategic battles, and stunning graphics, this game will keep you glued to your screen for hours. Are you ready for the mission to defend the galaxy?

This text is designed to introduce your game, capture the interest of potential players, and encourage them to try it out. You can adjust the text to better match the specific features and story of your game.

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: macOS 10.12 (Sierra)
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-2100
  • Memory: 4000 MB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GT 750M, AMD Radeon R9 M290
  • Storage: 4000 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: macOS 10.15 (Catalina)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4460
  • Memory: 6000 MB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 970M, AMD Radeon R9 M395X
  • Storage: 6000 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX

name: Galactic Striker

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7/8/10 (64-bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-2100 veya AMD FX-6300
  • Memory: 4000 MB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 550 Ti, AMD Radeon HD 7750
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2000 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 (64-bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4460 veya AMD FX-8350
  • Memory: 6000 MB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 960, AMD Radeon R9 280
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 4000 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX

short_description: Galactic Striker is an action-packed top-down space shooter where you battle enemy fleets, upgrade your spaceship, and save the galaxy. Experience thrilling combat, epic boss fights, and retro-style graphics in this exciting space adventure.
